translated: The meaning is that he should offer the cleaning materials, water, towels, etc.

original: rkang pa bkru bar gtogs pa la nan tan bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkang pa bkru bar gtogs pa la nan tan bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should be diligent in attending to the washing of the feet.

original: gnas kyi rkang pa bkru ba der gtogs pa bsku mnye dang dril phyis la sogs pa bya ba gang yin pa de la gnas pas nan tan bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi rkang pa bkru ba der gtogs pa bsku mnye dang dril phyis la sogs pa bya ba gang yin pa de la gnas pas nan tan bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that the resident monk should be diligent in whatever needs to be done there, such as massaging and rubbing the feet of the visiting monk.🔽He should prepare the bed and seat.

original: mal dang stan bsham par bya'o zhes bya ba ni / gnas pas gnas kyi mal dang stan bsham par bya ba'o //🔽sham thabs kyi gzan dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mal dang stan bsham par bya'o zhes bya ba ni / gnas pas gnas kyi mal dang stan bsham par bya ba'o // sham thabs kyi gzan dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning is that the resident monk should prepare the bed and seat in the guest house.🔽He should offer the lower robe as a bed covering.

original: sham thabs kyi gzan nub mo'i gos dbul zhing bskon par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sham thabs kyi gzan nub mo'i gos dbul zhing bskon par bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that he should offer the lower robe as a bed covering and put it on the bed.

original: sham thabs blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sham thabs blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should take the lower robe.

original: gnas kyi sham thabs sham thabs kyi gzan gyis brjes nas gas pas blang zhing gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi sham thabs sham thabs kyi gzan gyis brjes nas gas pas blang zhing gzhag par bya ba'o //
translated: He should put on the lower robe of the monastery, and put on the upper robe of the lower robe.

original: rkang pa'i chu dang rten dang chol zangs dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rkang pa'i chu dang rten dang chol zangs dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: He should offer water for the feet, a foot-stool, and a foot-washing implement.

original: rkang pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
analyzed: rkang pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
translated: The word “feet”

original: chu dang rten gnyi ga dang so sor sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: chu dang rten gnyi ga dang so sor sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: is connected with both “water” and “stool,” and also with each individually.

original: rkang pa'i chu la sogs pa dbul bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkang pa'i chu la sogs pa dbul bar bya ba ni /
translated: The offering of water for the feet, etc.,

original: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang rkang rten dang chol zangs dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rkang pa bkru ba'i chu dang rkang rten dang chol zangs dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that he should offer water for washing the feet, a foot-stool, and a foot-washing implement.

original: mchil lham gnyis phyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchil lham gnyis phyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should take out the two sandals.

original: des kyang de dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os nges par shes par byas nas gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba spras te /
analyzed: des kyang de dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os nges par shes par byas nas gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba spras te /
translated: it is said that he should also be entrusted by ascertaining his suitability through questioning and so on.

original: gnas des kyang gnas pa de gnas kyi 'os dge slong la gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas des kyang gnas pa de gnas kyi 'os dge slong la gtad par bya'o //
translated: That abider should also entrust that abider to a suitable monk.

original: ci ma brtags par ram zhe na /
analyzed: ci ma brtags par ram zhe na /
translated: Is it without examination?

original: de'i phyir / nges par shes par byas nas zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / nges par shes par byas nas zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: For that reason, it is said that he should be entrusted after ascertaining it.

original: dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os de'i tshul khrims dang spyod @67b pa la sogs pa nges par shes par byas nas gnas kyi 'os su rung na de la gtad par bya'i thams cad la ni gtad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dri ba la sogs pas gnas kyi 'os de'i tshul khrims dang spyod @67b pa la sogs pa nges par shes par byas nas gnas kyi 'os su rung na de la gtad par bya'i thams cad la ni gtad par mi bya'o //
translated: Having ascertained the morality, conduct, etc. of the one who is suitable to be a resident by means of questions, etc., if he is suitable to be a resident, he should be entrusted to him, but not to all.

original: 'di ni gnas kyis gnas pa la bya ba gzhan yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gnas kyis gnas pa la bya ba gzhan yin te /
translated: This is another activity of the resident towards the resident.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po las bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po las bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: He should be turned away from sinful friends.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the phrase from sinful friends,

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs pa las so //🔽bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽gnas pa bzlog par bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs pa las so // bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni / gnas pa bzlog par bya ba ste /
translated: sinful refers to those who are immoral, etc.🔽 Should be turned away🔽means that the resident should be turned away,

original: dgag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dgag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that is, should be prevented from associating with them.

original: dge ba la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge ba la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should be applied to virtue.

original: gnas kyis gnas pa de bsam gtan dang klag pa la sogs pa'i dge ba la sbyar bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas kyis gnas pa de bsam gtan dang klag pa la sogs pa'i dge ba la sbyar bar bya ba'o //
translated: The resident should be applied to virtue such as meditation and recitation.

original: de nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas kyis gnas pa de la chos dang zang zing dag gis dge ba de nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas kyis gnas pa de la chos dang zang zing dag gis dge ba de nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: One should accomplish that means that the resident should accomplish that virtue through Dharma and material things.

original: ltung ba las bslang ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba las bslang ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should strive to restore downfalls and to obtain suitable living requisites means

original: gnas kyis gnas pa dge 'dun lhag ma la sogs pa'i ltung ba las bslang ba'i rgyu la brtson par bya ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i rkyen du 'bab pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'tsho ba'i 'tshog chas lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa dag bsgrub pa 'byor bar bya ba la brtson par bya ba dang /
analyzed: gnas kyis gnas pa dge 'dun lhag ma la sogs pa'i ltung ba las bslang ba'i rgyu la brtson par bya ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i rkyen du 'bab pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'tsho ba'i 'tshog chas lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa dag bsgrub pa 'byor bar bya ba la brtson par bya ba dang /
translated: that the resident should strive to restore downfalls of the residual category and so on and to obtain suitable conditions and the living requisites of the requisites of life such as the alms bowl and robes.

original: gnas pas kyang gnas la de gnyis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
analyzed: gnas pas kyang gnas la de gnyis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
translated: The resident should strive to accomplish those two for the resident.

original: / gnas dang gnas pa'i bya ba'i zhar la nad g-yog brtag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / gnas dang gnas pa'i bya ba'i zhar la nad g-yog brtag pa'i phyir /
translated: In the context of the duties of the resident and host, in order to examine the nurse,

original: lhan cig ngas pa dang nye gnas dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dang / mkhan po gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs bshes kyis nad g-yog bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: lhan cig ngas pa dang nye gnas dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dang / mkhan po gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs bshes kyis nad g-yog bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: he said, “The nurse should be a fellow student, a close disciple, a preceptor, a teacher, a co-student, a co-pupil, a friend, a companion, or a relative.”

original: mdo'i don ni lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pas nad g-yog dag bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mdo'i don ni lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pas nad g-yog dag bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the sutra is that the nurse should be one of these.

original: gtam 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gtam 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A “friend” is

original: gcugs pa'i gtam la sogs pa dag gis dga' bar spyod pas dga' ba nyid nye bar sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gcugs pa'i gtam la sogs pa dag gis dga' bar spyod pas dga' ba nyid nye bar sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: one who is dear through conversation, etc., and who is a friend by virtue of establishing affection.

original: phebs par smra ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phebs par smra ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A “companion” is

original: gang du lhan cig tu bag 'beb par gyur cing kun du smra bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang du lhan cig tu bag 'beb par gyur cing kun du smra bar byed pa'o //
translated: one with whom one is relaxed and converses.

original: smos 'drin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: smos 'drin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A “relative” is🔽one who is related by blood.

original: gang dang lhan cig tu gnas gcig na 'dug pa dang / lam gcig tu 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dris par byed /
analyzed: gang dang lhan cig tu gnas gcig na 'dug pa dang / lam gcig tu 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dris par byed /
translated: One becomes familiar with them by staying in the same place with them, going on the same path, and so on.

original: ngo shes par byed pa'o //🔽'grogs bshes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ngo shes par byed pa'o // 'grogs bshes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One becomes acquainted with them.

original: @68a * // gang gis gang mthong ngam thos ma thag kho nar rjes su mthun pa med kyang dga' ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: @68a * // gang gis gang mthong ngam thos ma thag kho nar rjes su mthun pa med kyang dga' ba yod pa'o //
translated: A friend is one with whom one is immediately pleased, even if one does not agree with them, as soon as one sees or hears them.

original: da ni lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pa dag gi nad g-yog bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pa dag gi nad g-yog bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the stages of nursing the sick for those who live together and so on,

original: byed pa dang po med na 'og mas so zhes bya ba smras te /🔽nad g-yog byed pa gang yin pa ni ;
analyzed: byed pa dang po med na 'og mas so zhes bya ba smras te / nad g-yog byed pa gang yin pa ni ;
translated: he says, “If the first is not done, the next one is done.”🔽The one who nurses is

original: nad g-yog byed pa'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog byed pa'o //
translated: the nurse.

original: mdo gong mar lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas la sogs pa gang dag bstan pa de dag gi dang po ni /
analyzed: mdo gong mar lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas la sogs pa gang dag bstan pa de dag gi dang po ni /
translated: The first of those who are taught in the above sutra, such as those who live together and those who are close,

original: lhan cig gnas pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: is the one who lives together.

original: nad g-yog byed pa dang po lhan cig gnas pa de med na lhan cig gnas pa de'i 'og ma nye gnas la sogs pas nad pa de'i nad g-yog dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog byed pa dang po lhan cig gnas pa de med na lhan cig gnas pa de'i 'og ma nye gnas la sogs pas nad pa de'i nad g-yog dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'o //
translated: If the first attendant is not available, the second attendant, and so on, should care for the sick person.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the teaching:

original: gal te nad pa de la lhan cig gnas pa med na de'i tshe nye gnas kyis nad g-yog bya'o //🔽byed pa de yang med na mkhan pos so //
analyzed: gal te nad pa de la lhan cig gnas pa med na de'i tshe nye gnas kyis nad g-yog bya'o // byed pa de yang med na mkhan pos so //
translated: If the sick person has no attendant, then the second attendant should care for him.🔽If he is not available, then the preceptor.

original: byed pa de yang med na slob dpon gyis so //🔽byed pa de yang med na mkhan po gcig pas so //🔽byed pa de yang med na slob dpon gcig pas so //
analyzed: byed pa de yang med na slob dpon gyis so // byed pa de yang med na mkhan po gcig pas so // byed pa de yang med na slob dpon gcig pas so //
translated: If he is not available, then the master.🔽If he is not available, then the preceptor alone.

original: byed pa de yang med na gtam 'dres pas te /
analyzed: byed pa de yang med na gtam 'dres pas te /
translated: If he is not available, then the master alone.🔽If he is not available, then one who is friendly with the sick person.

original: de la sogs pa rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This and so on should be applied in order.

original: slob dpon thams cad las klog pa'i slob dpon ring ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob dpon thams cad las klog pa'i slob dpon ring ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The reading master is more distant than all the other masters.

original: de 'dir ma bzung ngo snyam du dogs pa'i phyir 'dir klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de 'dir ma bzung ngo snyam du dogs pa'i phyir 'dir klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, the reading master is also included here.

original: nad g-yog bya ba'i skabs 'dir slob dpon smos pas klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog bya ba'i skabs 'dir slob dpon smos pas klog pa'i slob dpon yang bzung ba nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: In this context of nursing, the master is mentioned, so it should be understood that the reading master is also included.

original: des na nad g-yog byed pa mkhan po med na gnas sbyin pa'i slob dpon gyis nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: des na nad g-yog byed pa mkhan po med na gnas sbyin pa'i slob dpon gyis nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: Thus, if there is no preceptor, the master who gives the precepts should nurse the sick.

original: de med na las byed pas so //🔽de med na gsang ste ston pas so //
analyzed: de med na las byed pas so // de med na gsang ste ston pas so //
translated: If he is not available, then a worker monk should.🔽If he is not available, then one who teaches the Abhidharma should.

original: de med na dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrub par byed pas so //
analyzed: de med na dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrub par byed pas so //
translated: If he is not available, then one who ordains novices should.

original: de med na tha mar klog pa'i slob dpon gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de med na tha mar klog pa'i slob dpon gyis bya'o //
translated: If he is not available, then the reading master should nurse him.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pa dag cig car na bar gyur pa de'i tshe nad g-yog gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe lhan cig gnas pa la sogs pa dag cig car na bar gyur pa de'i tshe nad g-yog gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If the sick person and his nurse become sick at the same time, how should they be treated?

original: cig car mi nus na gnas pa gang dang 'jug pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smras te /🔽lhan cig gi dngos po ni cig car te nad pa rnams cig car nad kyis btab na'o //
analyzed: cig car mi nus na gnas pa gang dang 'jug pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smras te / lhan cig gi dngos po ni cig car te nad pa rnams cig car nad kyis btab na'o //
translated: If one cannot do both at once, one should do the duty of a caretaker of the sick for as long as one is engaged in that.🔽The meaning of “at once” is “simultaneously.”

original: nad g-yog gis kyang nad g-yog byed par mi nus na nad g-yog gis gnas pa'i nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog gis kyang nad g-yog byed par mi nus na nad g-yog gis gnas pa'i nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: If many patients are simultaneously afflicted with illness, and if the nurse is unable to nurse them all at once, then the nurse should nurse those who are most ill.

original: 'dir yang gnas pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas kyi tshig yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang gnas pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas kyi tshig yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: Here, the word “duty” should be understood as a locative case.

original: gnas par bya ba'i @68b las la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig tu byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas par bya ba'i @68b las la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig tu byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the locative case is used to indicate the object of the action of the verb “to be engaged in.”

original: gal te gnas mang po dag cig car na bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gnas mang po dag cig car na bar gyur na /
translated: If many patients become ill at the same time,

original: gnas gang gis nad g-yog bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang gis nad g-yog bya zhe na /
translated: for which patient should the nurse first perform his or her duty?

original: de'i phyir / gang dang 'jug pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang dang 'jug pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “for as long as one is engaged in that.”

original: gang la zhu zhing bya ba byed pa'i gnas de'i nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: gang la zhu zhing bya ba byed pa'i gnas de'i nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: The nurse should first perform his or her duty for the patient whose illness is the most serious.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the sense of the root text.

original: nad g-yog bya dgos pa mang po cig car na bar gyur la nad g-yog des kyang nad g-yog bya dgos pa thams cad kyi nad g-yog byed mi nus na de'i tshe gnas kyi nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: nad g-yog bya dgos pa mang po cig car na bar gyur la nad g-yog des kyang nad g-yog bya dgos pa thams cad kyi nad g-yog byed mi nus na de'i tshe gnas kyi nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: If many people who are to be cared for by the sick person become ill at the same time, and if the sick person is unable to care for all of them, then the resident monks should care for the sick person.

original: gal te gnas kyang mang zhig yod na de'i tshe gang la zhu zhing bya ba byed pa de kho na'i nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: gal te gnas kyang mang zhig yod na de'i tshe gang la zhu zhing bya ba byed pa de kho na'i nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: If there are many residents, then the one who is asked to do the work should care for the sick person.

original: gal te de'i skabs su nad g-yog bya dgos pa gzhan zhig bcal thag par gyur la gnas de'i srog gi bar chad du 'gyur pa'i 'jigs pa med na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de'i skabs su nad g-yog bya dgos pa gzhan zhig bcal thag par gyur la gnas de'i srog gi bar chad du 'gyur pa'i 'jigs pa med na de'i tshe /
translated: If another person who is to be cared for by the sick person becomes ill at that time, and if there is no danger of death for the resident monks,

original: bcal thag par gyur pa de'i nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: bcal thag par gyur pa de'i nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: then the sick person should care for the person who is to be cared for.

original: mdo zhes bya ba ni don mdor smos pas mdo yin pa'i phyir des na 'di yang smos pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: mdo zhes bya ba ni don mdor smos pas mdo yin pa'i phyir des na 'di yang smos pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: The sūtra is so called because it states the meaning in brief. Therefore, it should be understood that this is also a statement.

original: gal te las byed pa dang gsang ste ston pa dang dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrub par byed pa dang klog pa dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dang / mkhan po gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang /
analyzed: gal te las byed pa dang gsang ste ston pa dang dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrub par byed pa dang klog pa dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dang / mkhan po gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang /
